CilviaDialogue: ^CILVIA: Oh! Greetings, are you here to speak to the Elder?
^COSMO: Uh, we were just looking around-
^CILVIA: Visitors! How wonderful. What brings you to the Pluvian Temple?
TheRest: ^CILVIA: Yes? Have you not seen a Pluvian before?
^COSMO: Yeah not to a great extent... You guys are pretty colourful though!
^CIELLE: What does the elder do? Are they... sleeping?
^CILVIA: Ah no, they are meditating. The Pluvian Elder has the ability to directly contact the Earth’s singing.
^CILVIA: Yes ! We Pluvia have a history of being closest to the Earth’s heart. Long before we were able to have our own consciousness.
^COSMO: So this Elder, we’re able to speak to them?
^CILVIA: Yes! Inside you will find a red bell. If you wish to just speak to the Elder, avoid ringing the bell.
^CILVIA: No problem at all, may you have a beautiful rest of your day.
